# [Interview #1052: WOR Signing Table Q&A, Entry #103](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=1052#103)

#### Leiyan

There are more than three planets in the solar system?

#### Brandon Sanderson

There are. With non-sentient beings. There are three planets of importance. So I didn't give you very much, you already knew â€¦ here's something. You may have heard a reading from one of those planets today.
